name: Brie Yourself
description:
The cheese elder sends you, little cheese curd, on your maturing journey with the mission to Brie yourself! But you’re not a Brie, you’re just a humble Emmenthal cube. There’s only one solution: you need a disguise! But be wary, since you are literally looking like a snack, mice are on the hunt for you. The cheese elder wishes you a hole lot of fun and a great adventure!

Gouda luck!

Controlls:

  • Walk -  Left Stick
  • Camera - Right Stick
  • Jump -  A
  • Crouch - B
